DOC.brief_summary: Examine safety , tolerability efficacy travoprost benzalkonium chloride ( BAK ) free ophthalmic solution compare either latanoprost bimatoprost monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Examining The Efficacy , Safety And Improved Tolerability Of Travoprost BAK Free Ophthalmic Solution ( Travatan-Z ) Compared To Prior Prostaglandin Therapy
DOC.criteria: Adults clinical diagnosis ocular hypertension , primary openangle , pigment dispersion exfoliation glaucoma least one eye ( study eye ) Age
